attributes.action: refund the £six billion each year taken from annual pension funds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government has scrapped tax credits on dividend payments in pension funds and as a result six billion a year less is going into pension funds.
It says "we need to save more" we do...six billion a year more just to get back to where we started before they interfered.
